Asset.Name: Coast
Asset.Title: Coast
Asset.Description: Coast hexes are the ocean hexes directly adjacent to land. They provide food and gold to a nearby city, but only if that civilization has the Sailing technology. Only naval units and "embarked" land units may enter coastal hexes. You cannot build cities on coasts; only naval units or embarked units may enter this kind of tile. Coasts can be worked without the Sailing Technology.
